title: Testing Overview
description: Testing ensures your code works as expected and continues to work as your application grows. It helps catch bugs early, improves confidence, and makes refactoring safer.

items: Unit tests — test small, isolated pieces of code
Integration tests — test how parts of the system work together
E2E tests — simulate real user behaviour

content.text: A common guideline is to write many unit tests, fewer integration tests, and even fewer E2E tests. This keeps your test suite fast and reliable.
